RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr signs Provisional Policy Measure #Minimum Salary: http://t.co/mw4SB1lybI
The national policy of valorization of the #Minimum Salary was implemented by the Lula government and watches year after year.
In 2011, we sent a project that ran from 2011 to 2015, encompassing this year. #Minimum wage
Now, we've sent another project for the period 2015-2019. #Minimum Salary
This policy, which represented a real gain in the wages of the poorest workers in that country, becomes a reality. #Minimum wage
RT @TVNBR: "We have a situation of systematic readjustment and appreciation of the minimum wage," says @dilmabr. Follow on @TVNBR: http://t.co/...
RT @portalbrasil: Dilma: It is important to remember that in this period we had a readjustment around 70%. #Minimum wage
This country has a solid economy, we have no imbalance. The country is experiencing a cyclical difficulty. #Minimum wage
It is important for Brazil to continue with the valorization policy of the #Minimum Salary.
Economic growth is not to the detriment of the worker, and there will be no reduction of social policies. #Minimum wage
The valuation of the #Minimum Salary benefits a huge group of workers, so that they have access to the minimum assets and conditions of life.
It is a special moment and I thank the parliamentarians, because it was with the understanding and participation that we are taking this step. #Minimum wage
I am aware of the importance of parliamentarians and also of the trade union centrals, which have played a relevant role in this country. # SalárioMimimo
The union centrals built with us the policy of valorization of the #Minimum Salary
